typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_file as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		reference as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		marque_id as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> unionEccoulement
source(output(
		OrgCm as string,
		CDis as string,
		Article as string,
		Description as string,
		{Hiérarch.groupe} as string,
		{Hiérarch.locale} as string,
		Predecessor as string,
		Successor as string,
		St as string,
		{Désignation Statut} as string,
		{Déb. val.} as string,
		{N1.groupe} as string,
		{N2.groupe} as string,
		{N3.groupe} as string,
		{N4.groupe} as string,
		{N5.groupe} as string,
		{N6.groupe} as string,
		{N7.groupe} as string,
		{N1.locale} as string,
		{N2.locale} as string,
		{N3.locale} as string,
		{N4.locale} as string,
		{N5.locale} as string,
		{N6.locale} as string,
		{N7.locale} as string,
		{N1.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N2.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N3.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N4.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N5.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N6.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N7.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N1.locale.designation} as string,
		{N2.locale.designation} as string,
		{N3.locale.designation} as string,
		{N4.locale.designation} as string,
		{N5.locale.designation} as string,
		{N6.locale.designation} as string,
		{N7.locale.designation} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> articlehierarchi
source(output(
		Client as integer,
		{Code postal} as string,
		{Org# commerciale} as short,
		Nom as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> unionsapehs
source(output(
		Article as string,
		Distributeur as string,
		prix_unitaire as string,
		{Durée_période} as string,
		{Période} as string,
		{Mois début} as string,
		{Mois fin} as string,
		mois1 as string,
		annee1 as string,
		mois2 as string,
		annee2 as string,
		dd as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> pricelisteReplicated
source(output(
		Client as string,
		BrandID as string,
		{Code Postal} as string,
		Nom as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EHS
source(output(
		{Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Nom du compte} as string,
		{Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string,
		{Compte principal: Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		Ville as string,
		{Groupe cible/Typologie générale} as string,
		{Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EPS
unionEccoulement derive(marque_id = iif (  instr(lower({marque_file}) , "saunier") >0  , 1604 , 1621 )) ~> DerivedColumn1
articlehierarchi select(mapColumn(
		marque = OrgCm,
		reference = Article,
		CDis
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(marque,
		reference),
	CDis = max(CDis)) ~> articlDropdupl
DerivedColumn1, articlDropdupl join(replace(unionEccoulement@reference, " ", "") == replace(articlDropdupl@reference, " ", "")
	&& toString(marque_id) == marque,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Select3, endEhsEPS join(POSSAMidString == toString(Client),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		Ecc_Code_postal = {Code postal},
		distributeur,
		marque_file,
		agence_code,
		marque_id,
		marque,
		Client,
		{Sap_Code postal} = {client Code postal }
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference = unionEccoulement@reference,
		{Code postal},
		distributeur,
		marque_file,
		agence_code,
		marque_id,
		marque
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select2 derive({code postal} = iif( !isNull({Sap_Code postal}) , {Sap_Code postal} , Ecc_Code_postal),
		marque_name = iif(marque=="1604",  "SaunierDuval", "Vaillant"),
		distributeur = upper(distributeur)) ~> setPostalCode
Select5 derive(month = toInteger(mois1)+ toInteger(order),
		Distributeur = lower(Distributeur)) ~> DerivedColumn2
Aggregate1 derive(distributeur = iif(  instr(Distributeur ,'sonac' ) >0 , upper('mabille') , upper(Distributeur)  )) ~> pricelisteTojoin
setPostalCode, pricelisteTojoin join(upper(setPostalCode@distributeur) == upper(pricelisteTojoin@distributeur)
	&& toDouble(Select2@month) == toDouble(Aggregate1@month)
	&& toDouble(year) == toDouble(annee1)
	&& toDouble(reference) == toDouble(Article),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Join3 derive(ca_ecoulement = iif( !isNull(prix_unitaire) , prix_unitaire, "0" )) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn3 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month = Select2@month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur = setPostalCode@distributeur,
		marque_file,
		agence_code,
		marque_id,
		marque,
		Client,
		{code postal},
		marque_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
pricelisteReplicated select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		Distributeur,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période},
		{Période},
		{Mois début},
		{Mois fin},
		mois1,
		annee1,
		mois2,
		annee2,
		order = dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
DerivedColumn2 aggregate(groupBy(Distributeur,
		Article,
		month,
		annee1),
	prix_unitaire = max(prix_unitaire)) ~> Aggregate1
setPostalCode filter(upper(distributeur)==upper('MAILLARD')) ~> Filter1
pricelisteTojoin filter(upper(pricelisteTojoin@distributeur)=="MAILLARD") ~> Filter2
Filter1, Filter2 join(upper(setPostalCode@distributeur) == upper(pricelisteTojoin@distributeur)
	&& toInteger(reference) == toInteger(Article)
	&& year == annee1
	&& toDouble(Select2@month) == toDouble(Aggregate1@month),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join4
Filter2 filter(toInteger(Article)==toInteger("0020082651")) ~> Filter3
EPS select(mapColumn(
		Client = {Numéro du compte},
		Nom = {Nom du compte},
		{Code postal } = {Code postal},
		Ville
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endEPS
EHS select(mapColumn(
		Client,
		{Code postal } = {Code Postal},
		Nom
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endEHS
endEHS, endEPS union(byName: true)~> Union1
DerivedColumn4 aggregate(groupBy(Client,
		{Code postal },
		Nom,
		Ville),
	temp = sum(temp)) ~> Aggregate2
Union1 derive(temp = 1,
		Client = toString(toInteger(Client))) ~> DerivedColumn4
Aggregate2 select(mapColumn(
		Client,
		{client Code postal } = {Code postal },
		Nom,
		Ville
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endEhsEPS
DerivedColumn1, addIdentifier join(replace(unionEccoulement@reference, " ", "") == replace(articlDropdupl@reference, " ", "")
	&& toString(marque_id) == marque,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftarticle
articlDropdupl derive(torigin = "article") ~> addIdentifier
leftarticle filter(isNull(torigin)) ~> fnullarticle
Select4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Fournisseur as string,
		{Coopérative} as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		{Désignation} as string,
		Mois as string,
		path as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		REFFOURNISSEUR as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		{Nom Coopérative} as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		POSSAMid as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['eccoulementUniforme.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outputPreparationEcoulement
unionsapehs sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		DR as string,
		{Secteur prime} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Secteur DEC} as string,
		Rallye as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['tunionSap.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
fnullarticle sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ecoulementArticleNotFound.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink3
